dc_creator_sm: New York (City). Department of City Planning
dc_description_s: New York City Miscellaneous Lots, 2013 is a polygon theme representing miscelaneous lots in New York City as of 2013. DCP Mapping Lots includes features that are not on the Tax Map. They have been added and maintained by DCP for cartographic purpose. There are three kinds of  Mapping Lots: street center 'malls' which are small road-divider type blocks separating lanes of traffic on certain streets; Traffic islands which are small traffic lane separators or pedestrian rest stop blocks other than malls (usually at intersections);  streets through parks which are streets existing physically in parks but are not part of the Tax Map.
